name: Space Boss (Capitan Findus)
description:
Welcome to the space challenge! You will have to try to resist as long as possible under the clutches of the huge boss.

More you hit the boss, more the score increases. But be careful not to get hit or you will die.

Your goal will be to score as many points as possible, but as the game time increases, the boss will become increasingly furious. Can you resist it? Good luck.

CONTROLS:

Computer: use the directional arrows to move.

Mobile: touch the right part of the screen to go right, touch the left part to go left.
